other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is mildly distended with hyperenhancement and irregularity of the mucosal surface. Pericholecystic standing and a small amount of free fluid observed. Luminal sludge and stones are present. Adjacent hepatic parenchymal hyperemia noted on arterial phase. A single 1.1 cm hepatic cyst in segment VII. Mild fatty atrophy of pancreatic parenchyma. Simple cysts noted in right kidney and pericardial or bronchogenic cyst at the right lung base.
